tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT,
    engagement_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT,
    shares_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    shares_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserEngagement (
    engagement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    post_id INT REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id),
    engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP
);
